articles.author: Barbara Erling
articles.title: Flood-hit central Europe will get billions in EU aid, von der Leyen promises - Reuters
articles.description: The worst floods to hit central Europe in at least two decades have caused widespread damage from Romania to Poland.
articles.content: WROCLAW, Poland, Sept 19 (Reuters) - The European Union will make billions of euros available to help central Europe recover from severe floods, European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen sai… [+4294 chars]
